# GitHub Copilot customizations

The [./copilot-instructions.md](./copilot-instructions.md) describes rules for
GitHub Copilot to follow when generating code in this repository.

To globally apply these rules to all repositories opened in JetBrains IDEs,
go to `Settings` > `Tools` > `GitHub Copilot` > `Customizations` > `Global`,
paste the content of this file there.
(or paste directly to $HOME/AppData/Local/github-copilot/intellij/global-copilot-instructions.md)
